attributes.action: More cycle lanes to be made on all main roads
attributes.background: Many of my pupils cycle to school and traffic is getting worse

rejection.details:
At the moment, cycle lanes and safety on local roads are the responsibility of local councils. 
	
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
